name: Enumerate
description:
Test your speed and precision with this simple yet addictive game. Use simple maths skills to climb up the rankings and beat your friends. Increase by different numbers, challenging your maths knowledge and times tables know how. Can you be top in the world?

This interesting game will take your brain into overload with split second thinking. In this game, milliseconds will determine whether you will see a game over screen!

Also please download Enumerate for FREE on the Google play store. The link's below.

IMPORTANT - Please play the game in full screen. Playing on a smaller resolution will have the potential of not showing components in the correct positions!
